backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with multiple OrderedMap-based data stores and type definitions for journeys, locations, profiles, ratings, albums, schedules, and bookmarks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected frontend files and components for map and schedule enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the root container and the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper configuring theming, identity, query client, backend debugger, and the LocationMapExplorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing journeys and schedule items with calendar popovers, CRUD operations, and nested management panels.
Utility component exposing the backend actor globally for debugging, logging principal and role information.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums including city selection, media upload/validation, and social media link handling with backend sync.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty or placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Provides UI for importing, browsing, searching, and editing Geoname-based city records with pagination and file parsing.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Interactive 10-heart rating widget supporting fractional ratings, hover previews, and readonly mode.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Renders a 3D interactive globe with time zones, city markers, flight animations, and dynamic overlays using Three.js.
frontend/src/components/itinerary/Doodle: Scrapbook‑style itinerary display that loads a journey’s schedule by day and renders themed headers and items using provided date formatting callbacks.
frontend/src/components/itinerary/RetroI: Vintage postcard‑themed itinerary viewer that fetches a journey’s schedule and presents day sections with styled headers and activity items.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for uploading, updating, previewing, or deleting a photo associated with a map location.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel handling Internet Identity login/logout, status display, and user feedback via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: MapComponent renders an interactive Leaflet map with travel spots, schedule markers, bookmarks, media popups, and routing logic. It loads various datasets via custom hooks and manages marker icons, focus behavior, and user interactions.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: MediaGalleryPopup displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in a tabbed viewer. It extracts media IDs, builds embed URLs, and organizes content into photos, videos, and social tabs.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: MusicAlbumManager provides an admin interface to create, edit, delete music albums and upload songs. It handles form dialogs, file uploads, search, and updates via music album query hooks.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: MusicPanel shows a dialog listing all music albums and songs for authenticated users. It supports selecting a song, viewing albums, and showing a placeholder when no music is available.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: MusicPlayerBar is an audio player that manages playback, volume, progress, and track navigation across all stored songs. It syncs with external song selection and loads audio URLs from file storage.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Provides UI to upload, validate, store, and manually execute syncing of GeoJSON timezone data with backend and IndexedDB.
Displays journeys and itineraries with filtering, editing schedule items, and optional map or flight animations.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: Manages CRUD operations for travel spots, including media uploads, social links, and city-based filtering.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows categorized travel spots and bookmarks per city, enhanced with spot types and icons for quick navigation.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Allows users to modify website layout preferences such as music player visibility and default search location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking via a React provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query and mutation helpers using the backend actor, including country normalization, social URL validation, and geocoding utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining theme variables for light and dark mode, including color tokens and specific heading and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Provides a solar declination calculation and a small test harness validating results for key annual dates.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Computes timezone IDs matching a given quarter‑hour UTC offset using Intl-based, DST-aware offset detection.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Handles loading, caching, and validation of timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and backend fetches.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Utilities for rendering timezone boundaries on a 3D globe, including coordinate conversions, polygon cleanup, and offset matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty page placeholder for future country map exploration features.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Interactive map page enabling searches, 2D/3D switching, time zone toggling, and integration with travel and music panels.
frontend/src/utils/scheduleDayStyling.ts: Utility functions for day-based styling, labeling, and date context extraction for schedule items.
frontend/src/utils/scheduleRouteUtils.ts: Builds per-day travel routes by grouping schedule items by date, sorting them by time, and extracting coordinate sequences.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to map schedule rendering, route arrows, and popup detail enhancements.
